patchNotes.title: Talent rework

texts.text: Moved to level 1.
subtexts: Rehgar will pick trait at level 1

general.developerCommentary: I want to bring <vanilla, abilities, trait, 0> as a talent to better be able to make more decisions on how i can control the trait and bring diversity on the utility section

patchNotes.developerCommentary: I want to change Rehgar from someone focused on a healer focused hero to an utility healer similar to Kharazim

changes.name: <vanilla, abilities, trait, 0>

texts.text: When used on an allied Hero, make them Unstoppable for 0.5 seconds. When used on an enemy Hero, Slow them by 80%, decaying over 2 seconds.
subtexts: Cooldown: 60 seconds

changes.developerCommentary: As mentioned on general i want to make it one of many options for utility shaman

changes.name: New: Spirit link

texts.text: Use on an allied hero to share 25% of the damage received for 4 seconds
subtexts: Cooldown: 25 seconds

changes.developerCommentary: A classic one from shamans that i don't think many heroes could share the same mechanic

changes.name: <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 1>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Grants an allied Hero 40% Attack Speed and 35% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 4 seconds.
subtexts: Cooldown: 30 seconds

texts.text: Moved from level 10

changes.developerCommentary: <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 1> can't be leveled up as a Strong ultimate without it being either kinda meh or absurdly strong on my vision for that i would prefer to make a baseline skill that can also increase the utility Rehgar could give to the team

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 0>, <vanilla, talents, 1, 1>

texts.text: removed

changes.developerCommentary: I want to change how rehgar talents perform and the simplest way i can say it is that those talents are not necessary the way i am handling the talents now

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 2>

texts.text: Moved to level 13

changes.developerCommentary: Mixing some wolf talents in one

changes.name: New: Bloodshield

texts.text: Rehgar will receive <modified, talents, 1, 2> when casting <modified, abilities, basic, 1>

changes.developerCommentary: This is intended for people who are stressed out and needs to bite the enemies with high intensity

changes.name: New: Bind shield

texts.text: Rehgar elemental totems will receive <modified, abilities, basic, 1>

changes.developerCommentary: Bringing the old problematic talent back as i am changing the entire Rehgar

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 0>, <vanilla, talents, 4, 2>

texts.text: Removed

changes.developerCommentary: I want to reduce healing talents on Rehgar and increase utility talents for the vision of a utility healer

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 2> renamed to Water totem

texts.text: Changed functionality: Reactivate <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> to create a water totem that every 2 seconds, will cast a untalented <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> at the nearest allied Hero with the lowest Health. This <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> heals for 35% of its normal amount. Also increase allied heros healing received by 25%
subtexts: Totem has 180 health | <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> has 260 health
Totem has 6.5 radius | <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> has 3.5 radius and 5.25 with <vanilla, talents, 1, 1>
2.5 range | <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> has 4.0 range and <vanilla, talents, 7, 0> increase the range to 5.75
It starts perfoming the effect

texts.text: Moved from level 13

changes.developerCommentary: I wanted to change the totems for them to become closer to the elemental style that normally shamans represent and with i used the reactivation on the totem to make it perform close to the original source but making different things and also the water totem is one of three talents but is inteded to boost the healing

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 0> renamed to Fire totem

texts.text: Changed functionality: Reactivate <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> to create a fire totem that will debuff enemies on area every 2 seconds reducing their Attack speed and spell power by 25% for 2 seconds. lasts 6 seconds
subtexts: Totem has 260 health | <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> has 260 health
Totem has 4 radius | <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> has 3.5 radius and 5.25 with <vanilla, talents, 1, 1>
7.0 range | <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> has 4.0 range and <vanilla, talents, 7, 0> increase the range to 5.75
It starts perfoming the effect

changes.developerCommentary: Renaming the talent and making it closer to what he was but being another totem means it won't have the slow

changes.name: Air totem

texts.text: Reactivate <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> to create a air totem that every 2 seconds, will pull the closest enemy hero nearby.
subtexts: Totem has 390 health | <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> has 260 health
Totem has 2.5 radius | <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> has 3.5 radius and 5.25 with <vanilla, talents, 1, 1>
10.0 range | <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> has 4.0 range and <vanilla, talents, 7, 0> increase the range to 5.75
It starts perfoming the effect

changes.developerCommentary: This is supposed to be the controller option. It was first intended to be a knockback similar to emerald wind but it would be too small and harder to make effective. One target is enough.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 1>, <vanilla, talents, 7, 2>

texts.text: removed

changes.developerCommentary: <vanilla, talents, 7, 1> with the changes implemented on the level 1 talents it becomes problematic to sustain something like this talent and <vanilla, talents, 7, 2> is being removed due to how i want to handle the gameplay of Rehgar

changes.name: <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 1>

texts.text: moved to level 1

changes.developerCommentary: As seen on level 1, the plans are to make <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 1> more reliable

changes.name: New: Shamanic ritual

texts.text: Creates a totem that will cast you current trait effect on all valid hero targets after 1 second. The effect will be recast after 4 seconds.
subtexts: Radius is 9 | <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 1, blaze> is 6.5
Cast range is 2.0 | <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> cast range is 4.0
Cooldown: 70 seconds
The totem is visual only

changes.developerCommentary: The idea here is to empower possibilities with Rehgar on the buff/debuff scenario and by making area bloodlust still be possible.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 0> renamed to Spirit waves

texts.text: Changed functionality: <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> will grant allied heroes unkillable for 1 second and will have it number of bounces increased by 2

changes.developerCommentary: As i said before i want to reduce the Rehgar potentital as a pure healer and upping the potential as a utility healer

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 1>

texts.text: Additional bonus: If the shield is destroyed it renews the <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1> duration and increase it's size by 25%

changes.developerCommentary: Earth shield is alredy a good talent but it's hard to buff it for numerical reasons so i am bringing it a IF so it could be eazier changed

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 2>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Ghost Wolf's Movement Speed bonus is increased to 30%. Ghost Wolf attacks against Heroes deal an additional 4% of the target's maximum Health and casts <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1> on Rehgar.
moved from 1

changes.developerCommentary: This is the habilitation card for every Rehgar maniacs outthere that wants to perform the hunt

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 2>

texts.text: moved from 7

changes.developerCommentary: Reworked it on the <modified, talents, 7, 0>

changes.name: New: Wind heal

texts.text: <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> empowers the next allied hero basic attacks making it hit twice.

changes.developerCommentary: Taking inspiration on the windfury segment from Shamans from WoW but making it perform different from what Thrall Windfury is

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 2>

texts.text: removed

changes.developerCommentary: Mixed it on the <modified, talents, 13, 2>

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 0>

texts.text: Changed functionality: <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 0> is cast a second time on the same target after 2.5 seconds and both healings are now a Perfect Heal meaning it can't be reduced.
subtexts: This means even Ana grenade can't cut the healing anymore

changes.developerCommentary: <vanilla, talents, 20, 0> is one of the strongest game ultimate upgrades by a long distance with the teamfight comeback potential BUT it's hard to balance as Rehgar alredy have a strong Base Kit. What i want to implement with this change is to make that more about making it optimal on certain situations rather than an all around pick.

changes.name: New: Shamanic Master Training

texts.text: Increase the <modified, abilities, heroic, 1> range by 35% and increase the number of reactivations to 2
subtexts: Current radius is 9.0 i want to increase it to 12 but i don't know how to math

changes.developerCommentary: I found this to be enough to be a fair upgrade ult that could be extremely powerful in some situations or even for specific traits

changes.name: New: Totemic Mastery

texts.text: Your elemental totems will now last indefinitely and will have 100% increased health points. You will also be able to use all the elemental totems
subtexts: Elemental totems are the <modified, abilities, basic, 2> , <modified, talents, 7, 0> , <modified, talents, 7, 1> and <modified, talents, 7, 2>

The other two totems you didn't pick on level 7 now will be new actives for Rehgar. So if you picked <modified, talents, 7, 1> it will be bound as an reactivate skill but the other two totems will be new actives within 15 seconds cooldown each.

changes.developerCommentary: One of the things shamans are famous for are the usage of totems so i wanted to expand that futher beyong on a way that could be skill expression.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 3>

texts.text: Changed functionality: When there's no nearby allied heroes close to Rehgar he receives 30 armor, increased 25% basic attack damage and spell power.  Passive: Receives cleanse when for 0.5 seconds when entering and exiting ghost form.
subtexts: Radius: 9

changes.developerCommentary: Rehgar was on of the best arena fighters out there and i see arenas as omega 1v1 situations.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 1>, <vanilla, talents, 20, 2>

texts.text: removed

changes.developerCommentary: With the changes made on bloostlust you wouldn't be able to pick the ult upgrade anymore and also Elemental conduit does not provide much for Rehgar gameplay on a lore perspective neither on gameplay feeling
